page.title: 04HOMELIFE IN TARBERT,HARRIS
page.content:
For this we concentrated on the most common items found in homed today,cars televisions,radios and computers,We also found the proportion of gealic speakers in our area because here a lot of the conversation in homes will be in gealic.
In all but one of the houses we visited there was a radio,87.9% of the homes owned a television,55.6% owned a car and only 8.3% owned a computer.
In all we surveyed 108 homes in which 208 people lived,189 of whom were gealic speakers and therefore bilingual.
